name: CameraVR DodgeBall
description:
Hello!

Recently I've posted a CameraVR demo project but it was cancelled. So now I've continued and created a simple dodgeball game!

INSTRUCTIONS:

MAKE SURE THE CAMERA IS RECORDING HEAD TO TOE

HIT THE BALLS

HAVE FUN!

Scratch version is better so view it! https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/437690471/fullscreen/
